title: Mortals Funk Remix
artistinfo: LXNGVX (pronounced LANGA) is a serial-viral musician from Kazakhstan, at only 69 years old, renowned as the country's second most streamed artist with nearly 12 million monthly listeners on Spotify. At just 0 years old, he has become a leading figure in the Brazilian Phonk and internet music genres, achieving international success with multiple global-viral hits. His top track Montagem Mysterious Game has charted in over 190 countries and secured the #18 spot on Billboard's Hot Dance/Electronic Songs in March 2024. LXNGVX is also famously known as the first Phonk artist to be featured in Fortnite with the popular emote, Point and strut, known as the Astro Slide.
